para1: Hola! We are very excited that you are planning to share our special day with us! The wedding will take place on Saturday 6 June 2020 at 1330 and we will be organising pre-wedding drinks on Friday 5 June 2020 from 1900.
para2: We have created this website to share information about our wedding to help you plan your trip and we will update it as we get closer to the big day.
para3: In the meantime, if you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us at
